headline: Compared to Estimates, Assurant (AIZ) Q2 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: The headline numbers for Assurant (AIZ) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended June 2025, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: Assurant (AIZ) Surpasses Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Assurant (AIZ) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +25.51% and +0.73%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Assurant (AIZ) Surpasses Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates

headline: Assurant (NYSE:AIZ) Posts Better-Than-Expected Sales In Q2
summary: Insurance services company Assurant (NYSE:AIZ) reported Q2 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 8% year on year to $3.16 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $5.10 per share was 14.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.summary: Insurance services company Assurant (NYSE:AIZ) reported Q2 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 8% year on year to $3.16 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $5.10 per share was 14.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Assurant: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: ATLANTA (AP) — Assurant Inc. AIZ) on Tuesday reported second-quarter net income of $235.3 million. On a per-share basis, the Atlanta-based company said it had net income of $4.56.
